original_title: Behind the Lens with Jenna Jameson
overview: Finally you can go behind the lens and peer into the secret world of adult entertainment. Who better to delve into the mix than with Jenna Jameson herself, the Queen of XXX! Go from unclad sexy film shoot to naughty dirty film shoot and back again with in depth interviews from Justine Jolie, Briana Banks, Krystal Steal, Sunny Leone, Gina Lynn and more.
title: Behind the Lens with Jenna Jameson
